string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Can I try App Press before I buy?
Do I need my own Apple Developer account?
Is there App Press branding in my app?

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: You sure can. Our Build plan gives you access to App Press for free - sign up here!
You can cancel at any time and won\'t be billed for subsequent months. No hard feelings.
You will need a developer account to deploy your app to the App Store or Google Play. If you need help purchasing or setting up a developer account, our team is happy to help.
Any app you build has no indication it was created in App Press.
